docs.title: Welcome to the CDD
docs.text: The Common Data Dictionary (CDD) is a centralized repository that provides standardized definitions, descriptions, and metadata for data elements within an organization or system. It serves as a single source of truth for understanding and managing data across various applications, databases, and teams.

docs.title: Citizen Class
docs.text: The Citizen model represents individuals with unique identification numbers and personal details.

docs.title: Fields
docs.text: Field Name Type Description numero_citoyen CharField A unique, auto-generated ID for the citizen. Not editable by users. prenom CharField The first name of the citizen. middle_name CharField The middle name of the citizen. Optional. nom_de_famille CharField The last name of the citizen. date_de_naissance DateField The citizen's date of birth. sexe CharField The gender of the citizen. Choices are: Female or Male. numero_de_telephone CharField The phone number of the citizen. adresse CharField The residential address of the citizen.

docs.title: __str__()
docs.text:
Returns the full name of the citizen, including the middle name if present.

  • Example Output:
  • "John Doe" if no middle name.
  • "John Michael Doe" if a middle name exists.

docs.title: Referenced in
docs.text:
The Citizen model is referenced in the following models:

  • RetireeProfile
  • TaxpayerProfile

docs.title: Applications
docs.text:
The Citizen model is used in the following applications:

  • CitizenAPI
  • GovTax
  • GovPension

docs.title: RetireeProfile Class
docs.text: The RetireeProfile model represents retired citizens and their pension-related details.

docs.title: Fields
docs.text: Field Name Type Description citizen OneToOneField A one-to-one relationship with the Citizen model. Each retiree profile corresponds to one citizen. yearly_pension_allowance DecimalField The yearly pension allowance of the retiree, stored as a decimal value. Maximum: 10 digits with 2 decimal places.

docs.title: __str__()
docs.text:
Returns a string representation of the retiree profile, showing the associated citizen.

  • Example Output:
  • "Retiree Profile of John Doe"

docs.title: Applications
docs.text:
The RetireeProfile model is used in the following applications:

  • GovPension

docs.title: TaxpayerProfile Class
docs.text: The TaxpayerProfile model extends the Citizen model by providing tax-related details.

docs.title: Fields
docs.text: Field Name Type Description citizen OneToOneField A one-to-one relationship with the Citizen model. Each taxpayer profile corresponds to one citizen. total_tax_contribution DecimalField The total tax contribution of the citizen, stored as a decimal value. Maximum: 10 digits with 2 decimal places.

docs.title: __str__()
docs.text:
Returns a string representation of the taxpayer profile, showing the associated citizen.

  • Example Output:
  • "Taxpayer Profile of John Doe"

docs.title: Applications
docs.text:
The TaxpayerProfile model is used in the following applications:

  • GovTax
  • GovPension
